tldr: Affected versions of this package did not mark `cv::MatStep::operator[]` as unsafe, although `MatStep` allows out-of-bound access. If the application did not implement proper bounds checking, this could lead to memory corruption or undefined behavior.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you use a version within the vulnerable ranges.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the library to the patch version, or implement proper bounds checking for `MatStep`.
